user_profile.name: Sofia Torres
user_profile.description: Sofia, a 30-year-old from Bogotá, Colombia, is an outgoing and tech-savvy individual with advanced skills in digital tools. She is motivated to explore cognitive exercises for dementia prevention as her grandmother has shown early signs of cognitive decline, and Sofia wants to take proactive measures for herself and her family. With a balanced decision-making style and a patient approach to learning, she values concise communication and clearly seeks manageable strategies to enhance mental well-being.

instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

Social gatherings for group cognitive activities
Solo practice to enhance memory and problem-solving skills
